Blackstorm::

"I understand... I'll go to patrol then " said the femme and she 
started to fly around watching carfuly and ready to attak in case 
that a Maximal was there


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/5/03 11:53:37 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Why don't you let me go to bring you that Autobot, Maxima?"said 
> > Blackstorm"I'm willing to prove that I'm a worthy Predacon..."
> > 
> > 
> 
> "I know you are. But... you cannot be as risk to be captured by 
then either. 
> You are too valuable to Hydras." She stated to the other fembot as 
she gazed 
> at her. Hydras would never forgive her for the capture of 
Blackstorm. That is 
> something she wanted to avoid at all costs. "No.. Battera can 
retreive 
> Wheeljack for me. You have a more important task, Blackstorm. When 
Battera 
> brings Wheeljack to this point, you will then in turn bring 
Wheeljack to my 
> location." Projecting a holographic image of this current world, 
it then 
> homed in the area they were in & indicated to an area that was 
unmarked but 
> was an area of mountains, even volcanic. "Bring Wheekjack here. 
Make sure he 
> does see or record the flight path. This place is not to be 
discovered."
